user.title: Configure Skippy N8N Assistant
user.description: Enter your N8N webhook URL to connect Skippy to your N8N workflow.

data_description.webhook_url: The full URL of your N8N webhook trigger (e.g., https://n8n.example.com/webhook/skippy)
data_description.timeout: How long to wait for N8N to respond (5-120 seconds)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to N8N webhook. Please verify the URL is correct and N8N is running.
